Building with Open Source Technologies â€‹

The focuses on exploring the capabilities and utilising open source technologies, with preference of projects from Could Cloud Native Computing Foundation CNCF ecosystem.

Target stack for our first milestone: Kube platform activation

PurposeTechnologyDescription
Automation Cloud-initInitial OS configuration
Automation AnsibleAutomates system configuration
Automation Ago CDDeclarative, GitOps continuous delivery
Orchestration K3SLightweight Kubernetes distro
Orchestration ContainerdIndustry-standard container runtim
Network CoreDNSDNS and Service Discovery
Network HA ProxyLoad balancer for Kubernetes
Network FlannelKubernetes Pod-to-Pod Container Network Interface (CNI)

Target stack 2nd milestone:

PurposeTechnologyDescription
Observability PrometheusMonitoring and alerting
Security Cert-ManagerMonitoring and alerting
Authentication KeyCloakIdentity and Access Management
Authentication OAuth2-proxyReverse proxy for adding authentication to applications
Storage LonghornCloud-native distributed block storage
...

Target stack 3rd focus on additional observability, security and backup management
